## Example code using pipes

```{r}
library(metacoder)
data %>%
  extract_taxonomy() %>%
  filter_taxa() %>%
  filter_obs() %>%
  sample_n_obs() %>%
  primersearch() %>%
  filter_taxa() %>%
  heat_tree()
```
